logentry.msg: IE6 caches authoring under HTTPS without this line.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
fixes http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43581 (custom datasources in cocoon.xconf were being nuked by an unspecific lenya patchfile) the approach is now to add to the <datasources/> element instead of overwriting it, which mandates another patchfile that will make sure an empty <datasources/> element is created first.
thanks to markus angst for this patch.
please test, i don't use custom datasources...

logentry.author: ragaller
logentry.msg: temporary test file for eol settings (I will remove the file as soon as I know that things are working as expected)

logentry.msg: We need to get the baseURL from the target. Otherwise it might not correspond to the AssertionCosumerURL and we did not get any attributes

logentry.msg: Clean up deprecation message.

logentry.msg: Load FCK from under the publication. Helps with customizing features of the editor.

logentry.msg: Substitute document-uuid for document-id as document-id is deprecated. See bug 43038.

logentry.msg: Children is not a valid sample type for news. Was logging warnings every time creating a news document was in the file menu under authoring.

logentry.author: rfrovarp
logentry.msg: Allow for deleting of files directly from archive. Fixes bug 43691.

logentry.author: jann
logentry.msg: If the request scheme is already https do not redirect again. This prevents a redirect loop. If you use mod_proxy than you have to ensure that requests are redirect to https://. Found no better solution for that redirect problem at the moment

logentry.author: solprovider
logentry.msg: Modified lenya.sh to allow multiple instances of Lenya and add stop command. Stops this instance before start attempts. Reduced dependence on environment variables: LENYA_HOME is set to current directory, and JETTY_PORT is set here.

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg:
added a configuration file for jetty6 (needs to be downloaded separately), in order to ease testing with proxied environments. see comment header of this file for usage details.
our included jetty should eventually be updated, since it has a bug that prevents ajp proxy connections from working - this is kind of testing the waters...

logentry.author: nettings
logentry.msg: added example proxy settings to create a known proxy test environment. no functional changes, since all proxy-related settings are commented out by default. web docs should eventually be changed to match the new example values once they have proven useful.
